Yes I know this is to be expected somewhat.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eHow much does everyone tune the values from the robot characterization tool?  What values are best to tune and what method do you have to the madness?  I totally think we are running a reasonable speed at 3.0 meters per second and 1.5 acceleration.
